mapper.update:
update KQDS_REFUND_DETAIL
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orderdetailno = #{orderdetailno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemno = #{itemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemname = #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unitprice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
discount = #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subtotal = #{subtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
arrearmoney = #{arrearmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paymoney = #{paymoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
voidmoney = #{voidmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
askperson = #{askperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doctor = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payxj = #{payxj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
payyjj = #{payyjj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paybank = #{paybank,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
payyb = #{payyb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
payother1 = #{payother1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
payother2 = #{payother2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
payother3 = #{payother3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
tknum = #{tknum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tkmoney = #{tkmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
refundid = #{refundid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
costno = #{costno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payzfb = #{payzfb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paywx = #{paywx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paymmd = #{paymmd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paybdfq = #{paybdfq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
qfbh = #{qfbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paydjq = #{paydjq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
isyjjitem = #{isyjjitem,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payintegral = #{payintegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_REFUND_DETAIL set createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderdetailno = #{orderdetailno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemno = #{itemno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemname = #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitprice = #{unitprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtotal = #{subtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, arrearmoney = #{arrearmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paymoney = #{paymoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, voidmoney = #{voidmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, askperson = #{askperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payxj = #{payxj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payyjj = #{payyjj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paybank = #{paybank,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payyb = #{payyb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payother1 = #{payother1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payother2 = #{payother2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payother3 = #{payother3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tknum = #{tknum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tkmoney = #{tkmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, refundid = #{refundid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, costno = #{costno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payzfb = #{payzfb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paywx = #{paywx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paymmd = #{paymmd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paybdfq = #{paybdfq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, qfbh = #{qfbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paydjq = #{paydjq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, isyjjitem = #{isyjjitem,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payintegral = #{payintegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT YEAR (r.createtime) AS year, MONTH (r.createtime) AS month, SUM(tkmoney) AS tkmoney FROM KQDS_REG r LEFT JOIN KQDS_COSTORDER c ON c.regno = r.SEQ_ID LEFT JOIN KQDS_REFUND_DETAIL detail ON c.costno = detail.costno WHERE 1=1 AND (${years}) AND MONTH (r.createtime) >= #{startmonth} AND MONTH (r.createtime) <= #{endmonth} AND r.askperson in (${askperson}) GROUP BY YEAR (r.createtime), MONTH (r.createtime) ORDER BY MONTH (r.createtime) ASC
